summary.para:
A component that manages the generation of meshes and creation of GameObjects through an instance of UnityEngine.XR.Tango.MeshReconstructionServer.
This component will create a separate GameObject for each mesh segment (voxel cell) managed by the underlying UnityEngine.XR.Tango.MeshReconstructionServer.
All the GameObjects created by this component will be parented to the GameObject on which this component exists.
The target queue size for mesh segment generation. Defaults to 2.
Enable or disable each mesh segment's MeshCollider. Defaults to true.
If true, enables a MeshRenderer component on the GameObject for each mesh segment. Defaults to true.
Get an ICollection of GameObjects, one for each mesh segment generated by this component.
If true, generates a collision mesh and applies it to each mesh segment's MeshCollider. Defaults to true.

When true, sets vertex colors based on image data from the color camera. Default is true.
See Also: UnityEngine.XR.Tango.MeshReconstructionConfig.generateColor
If true, requests per-vertex normals be generated and written to the supplied MeshFilter for each mesh segment.
A Dictionary of GridIndex to GameObject representing a mesh segment.
A KeyValuePair of GridIndex and StaleSegmentInfo representing an invalid pair. Used in TangoSpatialMapper.GetNextGridIndexToGenerate to distinguish a valid segment.
The GameObject.layer for each mesh segment's GameObject.

The maximum distance in meters from the depth camera from which meshes will be generated. Default is 3.50 meters.
See Also: UnityEngine.XR.Tango.MeshReconstructionConfig.maxDepth

The minimum distance in meters from the depth camera from which meshes will be generated. Default is 0.6 meters.
SA UnityEngine.XR.Tango.MeshReconstructionConfig.minDepth

The minimum number of vertices that every connected component in the mesh should consist of. Defaults to 1. Smaller components (typically noise) will be deleted.
See Also: UnityEngine.XR.Tango.MeshReconstructionConfig.minNumVertices
The number of mesh segments currently being generated in the background.
The PhysicMaterial to use for each mesh segment's GameObject's MeshCollider.
If specified, every mesh segment's GameObject's MeshRenderer will use this material.

The mesh reconstruction resolution in meters. Default is 0.03 meters (3 centimeters).
SA UnityEngine.XR.Tango.MeshReconstructionConfig.resolution
The UnityEngine.XR.Tango.MeshReconstructionServer managed by this component.
A Dictionary of GridIndex to TangoSpatialMapper.StaleSegmentInfo. This is used to track mesh segments that require regeneration.

The algorithm used during mesh generation. The default is UpdateMethod.Traversal.
See Also: UnityEngine.XR.Tango.MeshReconstructionConfig.updateMethod

When true, will use multi-threading for the reconstruction updates. Default is false.
See Also: UnityEngine.XR.Tango.MeshReconstructionConfig.useParallelIntegration

When true, will clear away free space along the depth observations. If enabled, 3D reconstruction will create higher quality meshes at a cost to performance. Default is false.
See Also: UnityEngine.XR.Tango.MeshReconstructionConfig.useSpaceClearing

Applies the current settings to all GameObjects, updating or creating components as necessary.
See Also: TangoSpatialMapper.UpdateComponents

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.Tango.TangoSpatialMapper.BuildGenerationRequest(UnityEngine.XR.Tango.GridIndex)

summary.para: Creates a SegmentGenerationRequest for the mesh segment at the specified GridIndex.

member.param: The GridIndex indicating the mesh segment to generate.

returns.para: A SegmentGenerationRequest for the specified GridIndex.

summary.para: Removes all meshes (and GameObjects) previously generated by this component and resets internal state.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.Tango.TangoSpatialMapper.CreateGameObject(UnityEngine.XR.Tango.GridIndex)

summary.para: Creates a new GameObject as a child of the GameObject this component is on.

member.param: The GridIndex indicating which mesh segment this GameObject represents.

returns.para: A new GameObject. The name of the GameObject will be "Tango Segment i j k" where (i, j, k) represent the GridIndex. No components are created yet.

summary.para: Get the GridIndex that should be generated next.

returns.para: A GridIndex representing the mesh segment that should be generated next.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.Tango.TangoSpatialMapper.GetOrCreateGameObject(UnityEngine.XR.Tango.GridIndex)

summary.para: Returns an existing or creates a new GameObject for the mesh segment at the specified GridIndex.

member.param: The GridIndex indicating which mesh segment this GameObject represents.

summary.para:
A static struct for TangoSpatialMapper default parameters.
See Also: MeshReconstructionConfig, MeshReconstructionServerComponent.MeshReconstructionDefaults, TangoSpatialMapper
2: The default value for TangoSpatialMapper.desiredSegmentQueueSize.
True: The default value for TangoSpatialMapper.enableCollisions.
True: The default value for TangoSpatialMapper.enableRendering.
True: The default value for TangoSpatialMapper.generateCollisionMesh.
True: The default value for TangoSpatialMapper.generateNormals.
0: The default value for TangoSpatialMapper.layer.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.XR.Tango.TangoSpatialMapper.MeshChangedAction

summary.para: Delegate called when a mesh changes (added or updateD). Called from an implementation of MeshReconstructionServer.SegmentChangedDelegate.

member.param: The [[GridIndex] of the mesh segment which changed.
A timestamp of the change, represented in seconds, since application statup.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.XR.Tango.TangoSpatialMapper.MeshReadyAction

summary.para: Delegate called when a mesh has been generated. Called from an implementation of MeshReconstructionServer.SegmentReadyDelegate.

member.param: A SegmentGenerationResult representing the mesh that was generated.

summary.para: An event which fires when a mesh segment has changed (added or updated). See TangoSpatialMapper.MeshChangedAction.
An event which fires when a mesh segment has been generated. See TangoSpatialMapper.MeshReadyAction.

Called when properties (e.g. TangoSpatialMapper.enableCollisions, TangoSpatialMapper.enableRendering) should be updated due to serialization changes.
This can be triggered during editor undo/redo or by the animation system. Calls TangoSpatialMapper.ApplyPropertiesToAllGameObjects to apply the changes to existing [[GameObject]s.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.Tango.TangoSpatialMapper.OnSegmentChanged(UnityEngine.XR.Tango.GridIndex,UnityEngine.XR.Tango.SegmentChange,System.Double)

summary.para: Callback supplied to MeshReconstructionServer.GetChangedSegments. MeshReconstructionServer.GetChangedSegments is called every frame from inside this component's Update method.

member.param: The [[GridIndex] of the mesh segment which changed.
A timestamp of the change, represented in seconds, since application statup.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.Tango.TangoSpatialMapper.OnSegmentReady(UnityEngine.XR.Tango.SegmentGenerationResult)

summary.para: Callback supplied to MeshReconstructionServer.GenerateSegmentAsync. Used to inform the component when a mesh generation request has completed.

member.param: A SegmentGenerationResult representing the mesh that was generated.

summary.para:
Contains information about mesh segments (voxels) that have changed but have not yet been (re)generated.
See Also: MeshReconstructionConfig, MeshReconstructionServerComponent, TangoSpatialMapper
The type of change, either SegmentChange.Added or SegmentChange.Updated.
A timestamp indicating when the mesh segment was last updated.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.XR.Tango.TangoSpatialMapper.UpdateComponents(UnityEngine.GameObject)

summary.para: Applies the current settings to a GameObject, updating or creating components as necessary.

member.param: The GameObject to which settings are applied.
